# init(texture:)

**Initializer**

Creates an object from a specified texture.

## Declaration

```swift
init(texture: PhysicallyBasedMaterial.Texture? = nil)
```

## Parameters

- **texture**: The clearcoat normals as the texture of a UV-mapped image.
title: init(texture:)
